content.description:
You will read a selection in Chinese. After reading the selection, choose the response that is best according to the selection.
Read this pubic sign.
(Simplified characters)
消防通道，禁止停车
(Traditional characters)
消防通道，禁止停車
content.question: The purpose of the sign is to

choices.label: direct people to a certain location
allow access for people with disabilities
post the penalty for violating a regulation
provide for a particular emergency situation

content.answer: provide for a particular emergency situation

unit.text: 5: Factors That Impact the Quality of Life

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Interpret the distinguishing features of a text.
